informationStorage

Class UnitMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • informationStorage.UnitMapper

  • public class UnitMapper
extends java.lang.Object
    UnitMapper.java --- Class for mapping two Units together. This includes i.e. Units following another one.
    Author:
    P H - 09.10.2017

    • Method Detail

      • isBeingMapped

        public boolean isBeingMapped(bwapi.Unit unit)
        Function for testing if a specific Unit is already being mapped by another Unit.
        Parameters:
        unit - the Unit / Value that is tested.
        Returns:
        true if a Unit is mapped to that specific Unit, false if not.

      • isMapped

        public boolean isMapped(bwapi.Unit unit)
        Function for testing if a Unit is mapped to another Unit.
        Parameters:
        unit - the Unit / Key that is tested.
        Returns:
        true if the Unit is mapped to another Unit, false if not.

      • mapUnit

        public boolean mapUnit(bwapi.Unit key,
                       bwapi.Unit value)
        Function for mapping a Unit to another one.
        Parameters:
        key - the Unit that is going to be mapped as key.
        value - the Unit that is going to be mapped as value.
        Returns:
        true if the mapping of the Unit to the target was a success and no other Unit was mapped to it.

      • unmapUnit

        public void unmapUnit(bwapi.Unit key)
        Function for removing a mapping of a Unit.
        Parameters:
        key - the Unit whose mapping to a target is going to be removed.

      • getMappedUnit

        public bwapi.Unit getMappedUnit(bwapi.Unit key)
        Function for retrieving the Unit that the provided Unit is currently mapped to.
        Parameters:
        key - the Unit whose mapped Unit is requested.
        Returns:
        the Unit that the provided key Unit is currently being mapped to or null, if the provided Unit is currently not mapped to any.

      • getMappingUnit

        public bwapi.Unit getMappingUnit(bwapi.Unit value)
        Function for retrieving the key Unit that is mapped to the provided value Unit.
        Parameters:
        value - the Unit whose Unit / Key is being requested.
        Returns:
        the Unit that is mapped as key to the provided Unit or null, if the Unit is not being mapped by another Unit.
